channel.title: Got 1 error how i fix it
channel.description:
i made a special attack and got 1 error
[code]client.java:20459: illegal start of expression public int otherpkps = 0; ^ 1 error Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code] can anny1 help me plz?

item.title: Got 1 error how i fix it
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

                   [code] TotalExp = (double) (12.5 * hitDiff2);
                    TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                    addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
                }
    return false;
}

}[/code]

replace that as the end of code 1[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 06:56:57 PM[/size][hr]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,245905.0.html

public int otherpkps = 0; public int otherkillc = 0; public boolean diedInArena = false; public boolean ApplyDead() { if (IsDeadTimer == false) { if (Retribution == true) { animation(437,absY,absX); attackPlayersPrayer(40, 2); } if (Redemption == true) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); playerGfx(436, 0); IsDead = false; playerLevel[5] = 0; PrayerTimer = 0; DrainPray = false; ResetProtPrayers(); setClientConfig(83, 0); setClientConfig(84, 0); setClientConfig(85, 0); setClientConfig(86, 0); setClientConfig(87, 0); setClientConfig(88, 0); setClientConfig(89, 0); setClientConfig(90, 0); setClientConfig(91, 0); setClientConfig(92, 0); setClientConfig(93, 0); setClientConfig(94, 0); setClientConfig(95, 0); setClientConfig(96, 0); setClientConfig(97, 0); setClientConfig(98, 0); setClientConfig(99, 0); setClientConfig(100, 0); refreshSkills(); } actionAmount++; Dead = 8; ResetAttack(); HTimer = 10; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; ResetAttackNPC(); setAnimation(2304); IsDeadTimer = true; } if (Dead <= 1 && IsDeadTimer == true) { if(InArena){ for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { try { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } GotKilled(); } dropItems(); sendMessage("Oh dear, you have died."); teleportToX = 2515; teleportToY = 3864; pEmote = 0x328; savefile = true; IsDeadTeleporting = true; NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); frame1(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } return true; }

item.title: Got 1 error how i fix it
item.dc:creator: @kojomba kojomba
item.description:
@kojomba wrote:

here

[code] {
LoopHitDelay = 10;
} else {
LoopHitDelay = 10;
}

                if (!UseBow) {
                    if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff < 0)) {
                        hitDiff2 = EnemyHP;
                    } else {
                        hitDiff2 = hitDiff;
                    }
                }

if (server.specialHandler.returnWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])==true && server.specialHandler.usingSpecial == true) {
if (server.specialHandler.GetSpecCost(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) < server.specialHandler.specialAmount) {
server.specialHandler.specialAmount -= server.specialHandler.GetSpecCost(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);
setAnimation(server.specialHandler.returnWeaponEmote(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
ProjectileSpec(server.specialHandler.GetSpecProjectile(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]), absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX);
hitDiff = server.specialHandler.GetSpecDamage(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);
server.specialHandler.usingSpecial = false;
server.specialHandler.SpecialBarLength();
} else if (server.specialHandler.GetSpecCost(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) > server.specialHandler.specialAmount) {
sendMessage("You need atleast "+server.specialHandler.GetSpecCost(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])+ “special energy.”);
server.specialHandler.SpecialBarLength();
} else if (server.specialHandler.returnWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])==false) {
sendMessage(“You need a special attack weapon.”);
server.specialHandler.SpecialBarLength();
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff2;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
p.KillerId = playerId;
if (!UseBow) {
double TotalExp = 0;

                    if (FightType != 3) {
                        TotalExp = (double) (250 * hitDiff2);
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID);
                    } else {
                        TotalExp = (double) (12.5 * hitDiff2);
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                    }
                    TotalExp = (double) (12.5 * hitDiff2);
                    TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                    addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
                }
    return false;
}[/code]
